activities.title: Paris City Tour & Eiffel Tower Skip-the-Line
activities.description: Experience the magic of Paris with this comprehensive city tour including skip-the-line access to the Eiffel Tower. Visit iconic landmarks and learn about the rich history of the City of Light.
activities.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the start

reviews.author: John D.
reviews.title: Amazing experience!
reviews.comment: The skip-the-line access saved us so much time. Our guide was incredibly knowledgeable!

reviews.author: Maria S.
reviews.title: Great tour, slightly rushed
reviews.comment: Wonderful overview of Paris, though I wish we had more time at each stop.

activities.terms: Comfortable walking shoes recommended. Tour operates in all weather conditions.

meeting_point.instructions: Meet at the south pillar of the Eiffel Tower

activities.title: Maui Snorkeling Adventure with Sea Turtles
activities.description: Discover the vibrant underwater world of Maui with our guided snorkeling adventure. Swim with sea turtles and tropical fish in crystal clear waters.
activities.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before the start

reviews.author: Sarah M.
reviews.title: Incredible experience!
reviews.comment: We saw so many turtles! The guide was extremely knowledgeable about marine life.

reviews.author: James L.
reviews.title: Great adventure
reviews.comment: Amazing experience, though the waves were a bit rough that day.

activities.terms: Must be able to swim. Min age: 6 years. Children must be accompanied by an adult.

meeting_point.instructions: Meet at the Harbor Activity Center

activities.terms: Bookings must be made at least 24h in advance.
